title: Who's Been Sleeping in My Bed?
No Flame Like an Old Flame
Feed a Cold
description: Simon has a cold and Oliver offers to look after him.

title: Going to Pot
description: Ringo decides to get some culture. After meeting one of his teachers, Simon and Oliver are pleased to accept his invitation to dinner and Simon makes a discovery in the kitchen cupboard.

title: Love Is a Many-Splendoured Thing
description: Oliver has fallen in love, however trouble arises after he meets his future mother-in-law.

title: A Night to Remember
description: Burglars are in the neighbourhood, leading to an eventful night for the two households.

title: The Battle of Deveraux Dale
description: Lady Deveraux asks Simon and Oliver to take part in a historical re-enactment of a Civil War battle, the battle of Deveraux Dale, at the village fete. On the opposing side is the bookie, Bernie Miller, who has a score to settle.

title: Affairs of the Heart
description: Simon's ex-wife Stephanie arrives unexpectedly.

title: Settled Out of Court
description: A legal dispute arises between the two antique dealers following an incident in Oliver's shop.

title: The Wagers of Sin
description: Oliver and Simon decide to have a wager on who can make the most profit on an item chosen by the other.

title: Betrothed, Bothered and Bewildered
description: After a boozy night out, Banks remembers that he has proposed to Mrs Sadler. However, neither wants to go through with it, although they don't know that.

title: The Second Time Around
description: Mrs Sadler is missing Banks. Fortunately, there is a happy ending for both of them.

title: Born to Blush Unseen
description: Gardening Time. Oliver has something to show from his gardening efforts.

title: Grandfathers-in-Law
description: Lyn and David, with their baby Martin, return from Canada, causing great excitement to Simon and Oliver. However, the grandfathers have to learn to cope with the baby more than they had anticipated.

title: Nursery Times
description: Lyn and David are looking for a flat while staying at Simon's house. But Oliver would like them to stay with him too.

title: Whose Baby?
description: The christening is scheduled and Stephanie, Simon's ex, is invited, causing anxiety for both Simon and Oliver.

title: Never Say Die
description: Simon has to go into hospital but confusion arises.

title: Moving On
description: The house-hunting by Lyn and David reaches a conclusion. It causes Simon and Oliver to think about their own situation.

title: It's a Long Way to Friern Barnet
description: Lyn and David move to their new flat. Oliver and Simon decide to help them by redecorating the flat.

title: Just the Ticket
description: A series of mishaps contribute to a difficult day for Simon and, especially, Oliver.

title: A Point of Honour
description: Simon advertises for an assistant for his shop but runs into trouble after interviewing one applicant.

title: A New Lease of Life
description: Simon is feeling melancholic and decides to make a big change to his life.

title: Aspects of Love
description: Simon arouses Oliver's suspicions and, in turn, Oliver is the subject of a rumour. These lead to gossip in the village.

title: Neighbours
description: Simon holds a meeting of the Residents' Association. There is a new resident who is about to move in and this leads to a sleepless night for both Simon and Oliver.

title: Bonjour Paris
description: Off to Paris but soon they are in trouble at the restaurant and with the police, also causing a lot of trouble to an embassy official.

title: A Winter's Tale
description: Christmas time. Simon and Oliver volunteer to keep watch overnight in the local church.

title: X Marks the Spot
description: Oliver and Simon both decide to stand for election to the local Council.

title: S.W.A.L.K.
description: Simon has a female pen-pal who he is looking forward to meeting, with a view to marriage. However, the reality is different.

title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
description: Both Oliver and Simon are doing the pools and hope to win big. After Oliver makes a mistake, Simon takes the opportunity to have some fun.

title: Happy Holiday
description: A weekend away for Simon and Oliver in Ringo's mother's country cottage. Trouble is that it's the wrong weekend.

title: There But for the Grace of God
description: Simon comes across an old acquaintance who is down on their luck.

title: A Car by Any Other Name
description: The vicar wants to sell his car and gets Simon to help, while Oliver is also selling his car. A confusing time is the result.

title: Viva Espana
description: Ringo wins a holiday in a competition and they all go to Spain.

title: The Best Laid Plans
description: It is the 10th anniversary of the two antique dealers being in business; they decide to go out to have a meal and visit the theatre. But they encounter some difficulties.

title: Born Again
description: Simon is searching for the meaning of life and thinks he has found it after listening to a preacher in the park. Oliver, however, sees a business opportunity.

title: There Goes the Bride
description: Aunt Eleanor decides to get married after a whirlwind romance.

title: Two Fools and Their Money
description: Both Simon and Oliver are in financial difficulties and decide to approach their bank manager.

title: The First of the Queue
description: Oliver tells Simon about a bargain in a shop, which leads to extraordinary efforts by the two to be first in the queue to buy it.
